docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Second Agricultural Training
            Project : Credit 1396 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Second Agricultural
            Training Project : Credit 1396 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project is the second
            agricultural training project and would assist the
            Government to upgrade the quality of the extension and
            research services by:  (a) improving the quality of middle
            level training and higher level in-service training of the
            Ministry of Agriculture (MOA); (b) developing a career
            development strategy for extension agents; and (c) extending
            the ongoing Agriculture Management Development Program for
            one year.
